messages.subject: Re: Congratulations!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, hope everyone s summer was nice. Finally settled in here and loving it. We had a surprise visitor for 2 weeks, none other than mom! What a
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone, hope everyone's summer was nice. Finally settled in here and
loving it. We had a surprise visitor for 2 weeks, none other than mom! What a
wonderful new relationship her and I have started.

Wow! A lot has happened here. I've spent 2 days back reading and reading.
Congratulations to I believe it was Kelly on the birth of her child. I hope that
was on this list. Laura is having a baby, that is so wonderful!! And this list
has new parents, owners that is and lots of moderators, that's so great. A
wonderful bunch of women running such a helpful list. The introduction to the
list is so nicely put. Congratulations to all of you for making this list what
it is.

Kim
